job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Who We Are</strong></p><ul><li>We are doers</li><li>We are problem solvers</li><li>We are thinkers</li><li>We are technologists</li><li>We are listeners</li><li>We are partners</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>What we look for</strong></p><ul><li>Smart, honest and genuine people</li><li>People who take pride in their work</li><li>People willing to do what it takes</li><li>People who want to learn and help others learn along the way</li><li>People who laugh</li><li>People who do right by others</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>What we offer</strong></p><ul><li>A great environment without politics, micro-management or burdensome tools and processes</li><li>Empowerment to make your mark</li><li>Growth defined by experiences, not tenure or rank</li><li>Excellent benefits</li><li>Education and training programs</li><li>Casual dress</li><li>Industry leading PTO and company holidays</li><li>A flexible, smart, and inclusive work environment</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>What you’ll be doing</strong></p><ul><li>Active&nbsp;participation in&nbsp;the design and implementation of our software solutions – We use our experience to help translate client requirements into technical design and tasks</li><li>Collaboration with teammates, clients, stakeholders, and executives</li><li>Assist with providing estimates on assigned tasks</li><li>Independently write good code (simple, reliable and scalable)</li><li>Address moderate to complex problems during development and support. Document and communicate results appropriately</li><li>Participate in white-boarding sessions and impact analysis and explore methods and tools to improve the overall development process</li><li>Assist with providing estimates on assigned tasks</li><li>Learn new client information quickly, and translate data modeling, process modeling, and revision control systems</li><li>Developing long-term relationships and networks both internally and externally</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>What we’re looking for</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree (Computer Science or Engineering) or related experience</li><li>1-5 years of experience developing business applications (Microsoft environment preferred, but not necessary)</li><li>Preferred languages / frameworks:</li><li>C#</li><li>HTML / CSS</li><li>JavaScript (React / Angular)</li><li>Familiar with relational databases&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Self-starter and able to handle multiple tasks. projects and priorities</li><li>Enjoy working at an entrepreneurial company</li><li>Highly motivated and dependable</li><li>Passion for learning new technologies</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Not required, but nice to have</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, MIS, or a related field</li><li>Microsoft Dynamics 365 Certification</li><li>Familiarity with data analytics solutions (PowerBI, Tableau, Domo)</li><li>Experience working with Microsoft Dataverse</li></ul>
